document_data.name: Agorn Fuoco
document_data.mainbody: '''Agorn Fuoco''' ({{Pronounce|AY|gorn|_|foo|OH|koh|refs=}}) was a high-ranking member of [[Manshoon]]'s [[Zhentarim]] in [[Waterdeep]] during the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Agorn lived and played music in [[Mistshore]]. Later, he settled in [[Kolat Tower]] with his master Manshoon.
document_data.History:
Agorn dreamed of becoming a famous bard but he had no success so he decided to devote himself to the Zhentarim, quickly advancing through the ranks.

In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} if [[Manshoon]] managed to obtain the ''[[Stone of Golorr]]'', after the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] and some adventurers discovered the Stone's hideout devised by the [[dragonborn]] butcher [[Thrakkus]], then the high-ranking Zhent [[Vevette Blackwater|Vevette]] was instructed to deliver the ''Stone'' to Agorn. She would manage to deliver it during a performance at the [[Trades Ward of Waterdeep|Trades Ward]] theater called the [[Brizzenbright]].

Afterward, Agorn went to meet his mother and, inspired by the theater's play and by Amath, he tried to kill the woman in order to cut all his ties to his old family.
document_data.Relationship: Agorn was one of the lieutenants of Manshoon who was very impressed by him.
